welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tenafly, the charming town known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is the oldest terminal at LaGuardia Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at LaGuardia Airport, serving mainly domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively used by Delta Air Lines for their domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A small terminal used by American Airlines for their domestic and some international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 30 minutes per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a more luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
